oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Superbill" Invoicing for the Mixed Practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anderson, Mike
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: invoice
coded services
oded services
superbill
services
mixed practice
practice tips
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A superbill is a pseudonym for a style of invioce that lists all the services offered on a one page invoice and allows one to check-off only those services used. Coded services combined with a computer becomes a rapid method of charging all billable procedures; it insures consistency between doctors and lay staff, and the service history information is easily retrievable for summary review and adjustment.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1987; 165
